roleset.name: to apply oil or similar substance
roleset.note: ANOINT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'anoint' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from anoint.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: For one thing , there is an old master [*ICH*-1] on the wall -- `` Samuel Anointing David , '' a big baroque canvas painted [*]by Mattia Preti , a 17th-century Neapolitan .
